attributes.action: Create a Maglev train system form Glasgow to Edinburgh and Newcastle upon Tyne
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We ask for the government to create a Maglev train system between Newcastle upon Tyne and Glasgow, including stations at Edinburgh, Edinburgh Airport, and Glasgow Airport.

This will help the economy of the Central Belt in Scotland, and the North East region in England.
